fields.name: variable_name
fields.title: variable name
fields.description: The column name in the given dataset

fields.name: type
fields.title: type declared
description: The data type of the variable in the initial dataset
as declared in the metadata file

fields.name: type_estimated
fields.title: type estimated
description: The data type of the variable in the initial dataset
as estimated by the HBP mipqctool

fields.name: category_levels
fields.title: list of category values
description: A string with the category levels of the given dataset column
confined in single quotes and seperated by commas

fields.name: total_levels
fields.title: number of category values
fields.description: The total number of the category levels of the given dataset column

fields.name: unique
fields.title: count of unique values (for text variables)
description: The count of unique string values of the given dataset column
which contains string values

fields.name: top
fields.title: most frequent value (for text variables)
fields.description: The most frequent value in the given dataset column

fields.name: freq
fields.title: number of occurrences for most frequent value (for text variables)
description: The number of occurrences for most frequent value in the given dataset column
which contains string values

fields.name: count
fields.title: count of records filled in
fields.description: The number of rows that are filled in the given dataset column

fields.name: not_null_%
fields.title: % of not null rows
fields.description: The percentage of filled rows in the given dataset column

fields.name: mean
fields.title: mean value
fields.description: The average value of the numerical values in the given dataset column

fields.name: std
fields.title: standard deviation
fields.description: The standard deviation of the numerical values in the given dataset column

fields.name: min
fields.title: minimum value
fields.description: The minimum value of the numerical values in the given dataset column

fields.name: max
fields.title: maximum value
fields.description: The maximum value of the numerical values in the given dataset column

fields.title: first quantile
description: The 1st quantile of the numerical values in the given dataset column
(25% of records are below this value)

fields.title: median
description: The 2nd quantile (median value) of the numerical values in the given dataset column
(50% of records are below this value)

fields.title: third quantile
description: The 3rd quantile of the numerical values in the given dataset column
(75% of records are below this value)

fields.name: #_of_outliers
fields.title: number of outliers
description: The number of outliers of the numerical values in the given dataset column
(values outside 3std.dev from mean value)

fields.name: bottom_5_text_values
fields.title: 5 least frequent values
description: A string with the 5 least frequent values of the given dataset column
confined in single quotes and seperated by commas

fields.name: top_5_text_values
fields.title: 5 most frequent values
description: A string with the 5 most frequent values of the given dataset column
confined in single quotes and seperated by commas

fields.name: comments
fields.title: comments
fields.description: A string with various messages about the the values of the given dataset column
